DSjobtracker 0.1.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

    DSjobtracker

    What skills and qualifications are required for data science related jobs?

    Installation

    #install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("thiyangt/DSjobtracker")
library(DSjobtracker)
